Add forensic email link analysis tool

- Complete bash script for passive phishing/malware URL analysis

- Security-focused: no exploitation, controlled timeouts, size limits
- Automated reporting with IOCs and suspicious indicators
- SHA256 chain of custody for all artifacts
- Comprehensive documentation and examples

EOF
\)")
